sentences.sContent: And on the sledge sat a person whom everyone knew the moment they set eyes on him.
sentences.sContent_eng: And on the sledge sat a person whom everyone knew the moment they set eyes on him.
sentences.sCn: 雪橇上坐着一个人，大家一见这人就认识了。

sentences.sContent: Then, holding out her arm, she let one drop fall from it on the snow beside the sledge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, holding out her arm, she let one drop fall from it on the snow beside the sledge.
sentences.sCn: 然后，她伸出手臂，从瓶里倒出一滴东西滴在雪橇旁边的雪地上。

sentences.sContent: But behind him, on a much higher seat in the middle of the sledge sat a very different person - a great lady, taller than any woman that Edmund had ever seen.
sentences.sContent_eng: But behind him, on a much higher seat in the middle of the sledge sat a very different person - a great lady, taller than any woman that Edmund had ever seen.
sentences.sCn: 在他后面，在雪橇中间一个高得多的座位上，坐着一个与众不同的女人，她比爱德蒙以前见过的任何一个女人都要高大。

synos.tran: 用雪橇搬运；乘雪橇；用大锤打

words.tran: 乘雪橇；适用雪橇的地面状况；进行情况
乘雪橇；用雪橇运（sled的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a small vehicle used for sliding over snow, often used by children or in some sports
